title: My Ghost Lover Is Too Annoying - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Horror   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Absent Parents   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Timid Protagonist   Weak Protagonist   Zombies
author: Yu Shi Xi   雨十汐
description: In front of the well-known Guangming Hospital was a florist selling both bouquets and shrouds. The seller sold flowers in the daytime to get money from the living people and undertook nether world business at night to get Yang Shou from the King of Hell. One light, a man was scared to death by a fierce ghost and followed the seller ever since. They together witnessed what ordinary folks could never imagine...>
